amendment.description: To establish a climate change education program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2176, under the order of 7/15/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 53. Record Vote Number: 238.

action.text: Amendment SA 2176 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Markey to Amendment SA 2089. (consideration: CR S5098-5104, S5115; text: CR S5102) To establish a climate change education program.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 2176, under the order of 7/15/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 53. Record Vote Number: 238.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2176, under the order of 7/15/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 53. Record Vote Number: 238.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2176 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Markey to Amendment SA 2089.
